attributes.name: Ghostly Ectoplasm
attributes.description: A strange gel that appears to be the remains of a Ghost.

attributes.name: Gilded Spyglass
attributes.description: A very ornate spyglass that seems Ancient in origin. It's infused with azoth.
attributes.parsed_description: A very ornate spyglass that seems Ancient in origin. It's infused with azoth.

attributes.name: Gilded Trophy
attributes.description: An ancient prize, valuable then as now.

attributes.name: Gillflower Gills
attributes.description: The gills of a Gillflower mushroom.
attributes.parsed_description: The gills of a Gillflower mushroom.

attributes.description: Ginger root, used to add a spicy, warm note to cuisine.

attributes.description: The recipe for a very special brew, held by Chef Paul Giroux

attributes.description: A small glass vial, suitable for holding all manner of liquids.

attributes.description: A batch of chicken for the town's stockpile

attributes.name: Gleaming Lodestone
attributes.description: This magical stone pulses with lifegiving energy.
attributes.parsed_description: This magical stone pulses with lifegiving energy.

attributes.name: Glimmering Twine
attributes.description: A twisting vine with magical properties.
attributes.parsed_description: A twisting vine with magical properties.

attributes.name: Glintstrands
attributes.description: A shining tangle of plant fiber strands unique to Aeternum.
attributes.parsed_description: A shining tangle of plant fiber strands unique to Aeternum.

attributes.name: Glittering Ebony
attributes.description: Ironwood that has been transmuted to be even stronger.
attributes.parsed_description: Ironwood that has been transmuted to be even stronger.

attributes.name: Gloriaflos Petals
attributes.description: The multicolored petals of a Regal Gloriaflos.
attributes.parsed_description: The multicolored petals of a Regal Gloriaflos.

attributes.name: Glowing Dryad Sap
attributes.description: Used in crafting to apply a bonus of Constitution and Focus to an item.
attributes.parsed_description: Used in crafting to apply a bonus of Constitution and Focus to an item.

attributes.name: Glowing Gnufish
attributes.description: A very rare, legendary creature of the sea. Can be used in cooking to produce powerfully enhancing foods.
attributes.parsed_description: A very rare, legendary creature of the sea. Can be used in cooking to produce powerfully enhancing foods.

attributes.name: Glowing Guardfish
attributes.description: A very rare, legendary creature of the sea. Can be used in combination with other legendary fish to create the ultimate fishing trophy.
attributes.parsed_description: A very rare, legendary creature of the sea. Can be used in combination with other legendary fish to create the ultimate fishing trophy.

attributes.name: Glowing Mushroom Cap
attributes.description: A particularly magical mushroom cap.
attributes.parsed_description: A particularly magical mushroom cap.

attributes.name: Glowing Ore Sample
attributes.description: An ore sample so brilliant it almost emits a soft glow. Gem shards can be seen within.
attributes.parsed_description: An ore sample so brilliant it almost emits a soft glow. Gem shards can be seen within.

attributes.name: Glowing Plant Cores
attributes.description: Cores of plant creatures that shine brilliantly in the light.
attributes.parsed_description: Cores of plant creatures that shine brilliantly in the light.

attributes.name: Glowing Sap
attributes.description: The glowing sap of a creature of the Angry Earth. Improve your Angry Earth Bane trophy with this.
attributes.parsed_description: The glowing sap of a creature of the Angry Earth. Improve your Angry Earth Bane trophy with this.

attributes.name: Glowing Spore
attributes.description: A glowing spore found in elite chests around Siren's Strand in Reekwater.
attributes.parsed_description: A glowing spore found in elite chests around Siren's Strand in Reekwater.

attributes.name: Glowing Swamp Moss
attributes.description: A glowing piece of swamp moss that used to craft a Protector's Tuning Orb and can be found on creatures around the Eternal Pool in Reekwater.
attributes.parsed_description: A glowing piece of swamp moss that used to craft a Protector's Tuning Orb and can be found on creatures around the Eternal Pool in Reekwater.

attributes.name: Glowing Tallow
attributes.description: Animal tallow that has been exposed to magic.
attributes.parsed_description: Animal tallow that has been exposed to magic.

attributes.name: Glowworm Bait
attributes.description: Fishing Bait. Gives a large boost to chance of catching better fish in salt water.
attributes.parsed_description: Fishing Bait. Gives a large boost to chance of catching better fish in salt water.
